Description.Text:
Property Location
When you stay at TOP Hotel Post Frankfurt Airport in Frankfurt, you'll be near the airport and convenient to Fraport Arena and Hoechst Castle. This hotel is within close proximity of Main-Taunus-Zentrum and Rhein-Main-Therme.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 97 individually furnished guestrooms. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have bathtubs or showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and blackout drapes/curtains.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. A complimentary hot/cold buffet breakfast is served daily.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a computer station, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge during limited hours, and free self parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at noon Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. A complimentary hot/cold buffet breakfast is served daily.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

When you stay at TOP Hotel Post Frankfurt Airport in Frankfurt, you'll be near the airport and convenient to Fraport Arena and Hoechst Castle. This hotel is within close proximity of Main-Taunus-Zentrum and Rhein-Main-Therme.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Fraport Arena - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Hoechst Castle - 3 km / 1.8 mi
Main-Taunus-Zentrum - 4.1 km / 2.6 mi
Rhein-Main-Therme - 4.3 km / 2.7 mi
Lufthansa Flight Training Center - 4.4 km / 2.8 mi
The Squaire - 4.9 km / 3 mi
Commerzbank-Arena - 9.4 km / 5.8 mi
Messe Frankfurt - 9.7 km / 6 mi
Skyline Plaza - 10.2 km / 6.3 mi
Frankfurt Trade Fair - 10.2 km / 6.3 mi
Messeturm - 10.3 km / 6.4 mi
Festhalle Frankfurt - 10.3 km / 6.4 mi
University Hospital Frankfurt - 10.4 km / 6.5 mi
Senckenberg Museum - 10.4 km / 6.5 mi
Goethe University - 10.5 km / 6.5 mi

The preferred airport for TOP Hotel Post Frankfurt Airport is Frankfurt (FRA-Frankfurt Intl.) - 5.1 km / 3.2 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.

Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
